name: Moon Eternal
description:
Overview : 

  • Moon Eternal is a deep-fried retro FPS inspired by games like DOOM and Duke Nukem. In it our hero, Lenny, must face off against hordes of emoticons brought to life, and their mysterious master, before they take over the world. Moon Eternal was the result of streamer Moonmoon's 3rd annual game jam, which took pace in late May 2021. The jam ran for 72 hours. This version of the game has additional levels of polish, bug fixes, QOL updates and new features!
  • Disclaimer : This game contains many jokes that reference Moonmoon's community and personality. Any actual names or likeness of individuals are used in a purely fictitious and parodic manner. We had fun with this and didn't take ourselves too seriously.

Main Features :

  • Evil Emotes - Face off against 3 different emoticon enemies. Brought to life in all their scuffed glory.
  • Classic Arsenal - Wield classic weapons from the genre. A reliable pistol, powerful shotgun, and a precise single-shot ... taser?
  • A Mysterious Mastermind - Track down the boss and thwart his plans of emoticon-fueled world domination.
  • Combinable Difficulty Modes - Normal mode too easy? Interact (E) with the NPCs at spawn to swap/toggle different game modes. Hard, Timed and Deathless each offer their own unique challenge. If you are looking for the ultimate test, try combining them! Modes beyond Normal include :
    • Less player armor
    • Beefier enemies
    • Spooky lighting
    • Faster and longer-lasting enemy projectiles
    • Enemy chain aggro
    • And more!
  • Post-Process & Control Settings - Press (P) to pause the game and view our extremely limited gameplay options and settings!

Project Details :

  • Unreal Engine 4.26.2
  • C++ & Blueprints
  • Dev Time : 72 Hours
  • Team Size :  4 ( 2 programmers, 1 3D/2D Artist, and 1 Audio Artist)
  • Programming Responsibilities (UI, Enemy AI, Game Modes & more) 
  • Design Responsibilities (Level progression  & enemy design)

Please feel free to report any issues in the comment section below. 

Thanks for playing!
